name: trsh-mvmt
description:
version 4

 A barebones sandbox for a player controller I'm making. The controls are supposed to have a nice physics-y feel to them, with a focus on gaining and maintaining momentum. So far, sliding, running, wall-running, and air strafing are implemented, but I'm going to add more features later on. Your feedback helps me improve it, so be sure to leave your complaints in the comments after checking it out.

Have fun!

Planned Adjustments:

  • [bug] Can crouch run on walls
  • [bug]  Camera offset on wall-run (?)
  • [bug]  Slide hopping into a wall run and then flicking off it is apparently OP
  • [bug]  Wallrun gravity and velocity is negated by looking at the wall
  • Wallick is too OP
  • Wallrunning and crouching at the same time can tilt the camera off of the wall
  • Lower the speed cap (insane speed on slide hops)
  • Lower wall-run gravity
  • Lower slide velocity decay 
  • Add a minimum base velocity when sliding
  • Increase run speed
  • Stop wall-run-climbing when spamming jump on wall-run
  • Slow walking, crouching, and climbing
  • Sensitivity control/settings page
  • Toggle crouch
  • [your feedback here!]
